post_data: As we celebrate Earth Month, let's not forget the important role that digital sustainability plays in reducing our impact on the environment. From reducing e-waste to using renewable energy sources, there are many ways we can make our digital lives more sustainable. Let's all do our part to make our digital lives more sustainable and reduce our impact on the environment. #EarthMonth #DigitalSustainability #sustainableliving #reducewaste #reducecarbonfootprint #gogreen #sustainabilitymatters

Have you registered for #DigitalKarnataka's USA roadshow yet?  This upcoming roadshow across USA will comprise a series of presentations, fireside chats, group discussions and one to ones. This must-attend networking event is a ‘Limited Seats only’ programme, perfect for you, if you are based in the USA and planning to expand your business to India. Here's a byte by Mr. Bhaskar Verma, Regional Head - Karnataka, nasscom to reiterate what the session is about. Register now to reserve your spot in the city closest to you. A testimonial from Girish Chhugani , Founder & CEO of Stralto, Inc., an #investor in #India's #GrowthStory, highlighting the benefits of an offshore setup in a Tier II or III city in India.  Besides the inexpensive but dependable infrastructure, Indian talent is known to help drive global companies to success.  So, join us for this roadshow across 5 cities in USA that will comprise a series of presentations, fireside chats, group discussions and one to ones.  ‘Limited Seats only’ so, if you are based in the USA and planning to expand your business to India, register now : https://bit.ly/3FBKGo7Karnataka Digital Economy Mission (KDEM)Mikro Grafeio & other Partners in Progress#HubbaliDharwadBelagaviCluster #MysuruCluster #MangaluruCluster #karnataka  #DigitalKarnataka #roadshow2023 #india #usa #investmentopportunity #development #leadership #delegate #startup #businessintelligence #businessinindia #entrepreneur #networking

Highlights from a recent article published by Mass General Brigham regarding best practices and governance regarding the implementation of AI into clinical practics. #ai #healthcareai #medicalai #medicalimaging

Patricia Bath (November 4, 1942 – May 30, 2019) discovered and invented the laserphaco, a new device and technique for cataract surgery. It performed all steps of cataract removal: making the incision, destroying the lens and vacuuming the fractured pieces. Today the device is used globally.Among her many firsts, Dr Bath was the first woman ophthalmologist to be appointed to the faculty of the University of California at Los Angeles School of Medicine Jules Stein Eye Institute, the first woman to chair an ophthalmology residency program in the United States, and the first African-American woman doctor to receive a patent for a medical purpose. An #inspiration to #women the world over, Bath’s outstanding achievements stand testimony to her refusal to let setbacks frustrate her efforts and her steadfast belief in her dreams.#invention #technology #innovation #science #medicalscience #idea #womenofcolour #celebratingwomen #celebratingwomen #WorldIPDay

As a graphic designer, we all have certain expectations of what our career will be like. From creating beautiful designs to working with amazing clients, the possibilities seem endless. However, the reality of being a graphic designer is often quite different.So if you're a fellow graphic designer, don't worry – you're not alone in your struggles. Just remember, even though the reality may be different from what you expected, it's still a fulfilling and rewarding career. Keep pushing forward and creating amazing designs!#designers #clientfeedback #designchallenge #xevensolutions

We have officially established Pittsburgh, PA as our headquarters. The city has a vibrant technology community and a solid commitment to innovation and entrepreneurship. Preamble is excited to contribute to the city's growing technology sector. #aisafety #aiethics #responsibleai #pittsburgh https://lnkd.in/ehWwsy8K

Our CTO, Leyla Hujer was recently interviewed for WIRED magazine to discuss safety and security issues of systems like ChatGPT. Preamble initially disclosed the first prompt injection attack against GPT-3 in May 2022. It feels like this area of security research is gaining more traction. We will also have a more formal announcement for an AI hacking event in August at DEFCON. So stay tuned!#security #safety #hacking #ai #aisafety #responsibleai https://lnkd.in/e68Tmd-w

Multilingual customer support means ensuring that your customers, regardless of their native or preferred language, culture, or location, can get the most out of your products and services. 

Some customer support services that you can provide are answering customer questions, giving assistance, troubleshooting, or upgrading the customer’s experience in their native or preferred language. Learn more about multilingual customer support and why your business needs it: https://lttr.ai/9FEU#translation #localization #global

Multilingual eLearning materials are more in demand than ever before. Providing high-quality eLearning materials in various formats can make all the difference. In this blog, we discuss various eLearning content types to translate.

Read more 👉 https://lttr.ai/AAHVG#translation #localization #global
